metadata.title: CVE-2021-41184 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
jQuery-UI is the official jQuery user interface library. Prior to version1.13.0, accepting the value of the `of` option of the `.position()` utilfrom untrusted sources may execute untrusted code. The issue is fixed injQuery UI 1.13.0. Any string value passed to the `of` option is now treatedas a CSS selector. A workaround is to not accept the value of the `of`option from untrusted sources.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-41184` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjs-jquery-ui - 1.13.0
node-jquery-ui - 1.13.0
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jqueryui package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.13.0').
